meanings.definition: To visit multiple bars in succession.
meanings.sent1: After work, I like to barhop with my friends to unwind.
meanings.sent2: She decided to barhop along the busy street to find the best happy hour deals.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends barhopped their way through the city, laughing and chatting.
meanings.sent4: As the night went on, the city seemed to barhop past them in a blur of lights and music.
meanings.sent5: The idea of barhopping on a Friday night filled him with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: A person who visits multiple bars in succession.
meanings.sent1: The barhop greeted everyone with a smile as he entered each new establishment.
meanings.sent2: She became a regular barhop in the neighborhood, known for her friendly demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The barhop's job was to explore different bars and report back on the atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nightlife, the barhop was a well-known figure, always seeking the next great spot.
meanings.sent5: The young barhop was eager to discover new drinks and meet interesting people along the way.
